title: West Indies vs Australia Live Score Updates 1st Test Day 3
description: WI vs AUS Live Score 1st Test Day 3: Alex Carey's quickfire knock has allowed Australia to stretch their lead over West Indies in Barbados.
excerpt: WI vs AUS Live Score 1st Test Day 3: Alex Carey's quickfire knock has allowed Australia to stretch their lead over West Indies in Barbados.
text: West Indies vs Australia Live Scorecard 1st Test Day 3© AFP WI vs AUS Live Score 1st Test Day 3: Alex Carey's quickfire knock has allowed Australia to stretch their lead over West Indies at Kensington Oval, Bridgetown, Barbados. Carey, who is batting a slot down, inflicted more damage on West Indies after Travis Head (61) and Beau Webster (63) batted with caution in the morning session. The visitors began their innings trailing the Caribbean outfit by 10 runs from the first innings. West Indies did well to bowl Australia out for 180, but could only take a slender 10-run advantage heading into the second innings. (Live Scorecard) Topics mentioned in this article
html:
West Indies vs Australia Live Scorecard 1st Test Day 3© AFP

WI vs AUS Live Score 1st Test Day 3: Alex Carey's quickfire knock has allowed Australia to stretch their lead over West Indies at Kensington Oval, Bridgetown, Barbados. Carey, who is batting a slot down, inflicted more damage on West Indies after Travis Head (61) and Beau Webster (63) batted with caution in the morning session. The visitors began their innings trailing the Caribbean outfit by 10 runs from the first innings. West Indies did well to bowl Australia out for 180, but could only take a slender 10-run advantage heading into the second innings. (Live Scorecard)

Topics mentioned in this article
